Reason: The 'max_hints_delivery_threads' configuration is considered performance-sensitive because it directly affects the delivery speed of hints, which can have a notable impact on system performance. Increasing the number of delivery threads can lead to increased resource usage and contention, potentially causing significant performance variations at the system level. Additionally, the configuration involves time-expensive operations related to thread management and delivery speed optimization within the HintsService constructor, which further supports its classification as performance-sensitive.
